actions.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 195 (Roll no. 447).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Sherman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 195 (Roll no. 447).

description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit funds from being used to transfer defense articles or services to Azerbaijan unless the President certifies to Congress that the articles or services do not threaten civil aviation.
purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit funds from being used to transfer defense articles or services to Azerbaijan unless the President certifies to Congress that the articles or services do not threaten civil aviation.
